name: Eyelash Curler
categories: Tools & Brushes, Beauty Tools, Eyelash Curlers
about: What it is:An award-winning eyelash curler with an edge-free design that prevents pinching for an eye-opening, glamorous curl..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:This eyelash curler crimps and curls lashes to perfection. Its broad curve grabs every lash from inner to outer corner, no matter the eye shape, for the perfect eye-framing fringe. The flexible silicone rubber pads are gentle and safe on lashes, and it also includes one replacement pad.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Open the curler and position it at the base of your lashes. .-Gently squeeze down on lashes. .-For the fullest lashes, move the curler up away from the base and squeeze again in the middle of the lash. .-Press one more time close to the tip of the lashes.  .-Use a tissue or dry cloth to wipe the eyelash curler and silicone pads clean between uses.
